Long lines, high stress, no thanks🙅‍♀️
It's #TravelTipTuesday and as holiday travel kicks off, we want to share a few tips to help make the most of your airport visit:

🕒 Arrive early (2-3 hours before departure)!
😷 Mask up.
😌 Be patient.
👨‍💻 Check in online. https://t.co/Cs2VWgswrg

domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text:
Part floating pumpkin. Part childhood dream. You might want to add this one to your travel #bucketlist 🎃
Spend the night at #FreeSpiritSpheres and let Flair take you there with our newest Canadian route to #YQQ. Visit https://t.co/G3zwpKRiJx to start planning! https://t.co/ftIovbSaWX

urls.title: Flair Airlines - Best prices on flights in Canada
urls.description: Flair Airlines is here to change the way Canadians travel. Learn more about Flair Airlines, our low fares across Canada, and book your flights!

data.text:
Aisle or window? Whatever side you're on (literally and figuratively), call dibs when you book online at https://t.co/Ehj3JdcUFF

Côté fenêtre ou côté allée? Quel que soit votre côté (au sens propre comme au figuré), appeler dibs lorsque vous réservez sur https://t.co/Ehj3JdcUFF https://t.co/aCVnXxVIWJ
We can't wait! https://t.co/cp6kHa5Io1

Visiting #YVR and want to stumble on a scenic surprise? If you said yes, then cycling the Seawall is a MUST. The Brockton Point Lighthouse located in Stanley Park is the perfect place to stop for a sit, enjoy the view, and get a new picture for the 'gram. https://t.co/Xtphq0PJVc https://t.co/bd2yummSOE
RT @Ougasam: Ultra low-cost carrier Flair Airlines to offer flights to 19 destinations from Toronto | Venture https://t.co/bBem6AKrvR

With Flair's baggage options, you no longer have to #DressLikeAnOnion🧅 We've lowered our prices. Visit https://t.co/VnBmSQDNus to learn more
Avec les options de bagages de Flair, vous n'avez plus à vous #HabillerCommeUnOignon🧅 Nous avons baissé nos prix. https://t.co/VnBmSQDNus https://t.co/RgHSlUh2LH
